de.weltraumschaf.juberblog.cmd.install

Class Scaffold.JarResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.weltraumschaf.juberblog.cmd.install.Scaffold.JarResource
  • Enclosing class:
    Scaffold

    static final class Scaffold.JarResource
extends Object
    A JAR resource consists of the absolute path of the JAR file and the location of the resource inside the JAR.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private String jarLocation
      Location of the JAR file.
      private String resourceLocation
      Location of resource inside JAR file.

      • newSourceJar

        static Scaffold.JarResource newSourceJar(String path)
        Create a resource from a given path.

        A path should have the format: jar:file/path/to/jar/file.jar!/package/in/the/jar/File.class.

        Parameters:
        path - must not be null or empty
        Returns:
        never null
